name: Cirno's Perfect Snowbash
description:
Made in 72ish hours for the Touhou Fan Game 10 Jam. Made by 2 people. All assets excluding snowball_hit_sfx were made during the jam period. 

Programmer's Note:

In the character select screen, the AI toggle will toggle whether you control the character or the AI does. Most of my time was spent on making the AI and it only works 60% of the time;;;;;

Artist's Note:

✨🍄✨

Musician's Note:

I prefer listening to the music over playing the game itself. (the musician is also the programmer)

Controls:

WASD: Move

E: Gather Snow

Q: Use Ability

Mouse: Aim

Left Click: Throw (requires standing still)

Right Click: Build

Character Abilities:

Cirno: Spawn homing projectiles based on snow gathered.

Reimu: Clear nearby projectiles.

Nitori: Make nearby walls orbit self based on snow gathered.
